page.title: 04HARPER ADAMS COLLEGE EDGMOND
page.content: The{students}at Harper Adams College get a lot of entertainment. This includes bands, karate club, ballroom dancing, rugby, football, parachuting, and maybe squash in a few years time. There is also a swimming pool and two tennis courts on the college grounds. About three quarters of the students have cars and so a lot of parking space is needed. Altogether there are 710 students, 240 of whom live in at the college. Most of the students who live out stay in rented cottages. There are about a quarter girls to three quarters boys at college. A library is also in the college grounds and the students can obtain a vast number of different books mostly to do with farming.
